title: Stage Lv6-D4-S11
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Market risk exposure has been measured. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Credit risk is increasing. (professional variant 1)
Market risk exposure has been measured. (professional variant 1)
Operational risk management has been strengthened. (professional variant 1)
Stress testing has been conducted. (professional variant 1)
Scenario analysis has been performed. (professional variant 1)
Counterparty risk must be assessed. (professional variant 1)
Collateral requirements have been strengthened. (professional variant 1)
Regulatory capital is adequate. (professional variant 1)
Risk limits have been established. (professional variant 1)
Backtesting results are satisfactory. (professional variant 1)
